scripts.create:stage: claudia create --name stage-authorizer --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/lambda_basic_execution --config claudia-stage.json
scripts.create:prod: claudia create --name prod-authorizer --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/lambda_basic_execution --config claudia-prod.json
